title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - qualifiers suggest

content.prompt: The qualifiers "for them" (second paragraph) and "so everyone said" (end of final paragraph) suggest that

choices.label: John is confident that he will replace his doubt with joy and ecstasy
John shares the experience of those around him sympathetically
John feels himself to be isolated from the rest of the congregation
the speaker views the congregation as the ultimate authority over John

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
